hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$8{:}35$ is $35$ minutes after $8{:}00$. 

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 8:00 and 60 is labeled 9:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. The label 8:35 is at 5 marks to the right of 30.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ed9cd751737c56be2796ec10f25017cd6b4c8694) 

So, we move $35$ tick marks past $8{:}00$.

This number line shows $8{:}35$ graphed:

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 8:00 and 60 is labeled 9:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. Point C is labeled at 5 marks to the right of 30.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c5be7c6b45403a6755a122c8c60201cd2d57abd3)

question.content:
**On which number line is $8{:}35$ graphed?**
